title: Post Quantum Cryptography on the Internet
author: Franziskus Kiefer
abstract: A short introduction into post-quantum crypto, talking about challenges and ongoing work.

title: Trusting a CA? Verify!
author: Frederik Braun
abstract: Numerous incidents have shown that Certificate Authorities (CA) are not always as trustworthy as they should be. This talk introduces various techniques that allow stricter setups in a safe way. First of all, HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) allows websites to enforce certificate pinning in the browser. Certificate Transparency helps establishing a verifiable append-only record of certificates. Lastly, DNS CAA records help establishing CA-pinning mechanism for both client programs as well as CA infrastructure.
